name: LH Logged In Static Frontpage
author: Peter Shaw

sections.description:
Do you use a static front page but want to display different information for you members. Well not you can. This plugin allows you too set a different front page for logged in users.

It is very simple to set up and just works.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire lh-logged-in-static-frontpage folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Settings->Reading to set the page ID of the page for logged in visitors on the frontend.
sections.changelog:
1.00 July 22, 2016
Initial release.

1.01 July 29, 2017
Slight code improvement.

1.03 December 13, 2017
Enable different handling of show_on_front for logged in and non logged in
